text:
[MUSIC - SARAH JEFFERY, "QUEEN
 OF MEAN"]

(SINGING) I followed
all the rules.
I drew inside the lines.

I never asked for
anything that wasn't mine.
Being nice was my pastime.

But I've been hurt
for the last time.

I never thought
of myself as mean.

I always thought that
I'd be the queen.
And there's no in between.

Cause if I can't have that,
then I would be the leader
of the dark and the bad.

Now there's a devil
on the shoulder
where the angels used to be.

And he's calling me
the queen of mean.
Calling me the queen of mean.

All of my senses have
left me defenseless.

This darkness around me
is promising vengeance.

The price that I'm willing
to pay is expensive.

There's nothing to lose when
you're lonely and friendless.

So my only interest is
showing this princess

that I am the queen and
my reign will be endless.
